remarks:
Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90.  The hypothesis can be thought of as " ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` ."  See ~ 19.21v for a version requiring fewer axioms.  See also ~ 19.21h .  (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)
